p: A fraction (1/20) of the total isolated RNA was used in the reactions. Head and thorax samples from YFV-challenged mosquitoes were analyzed in duplicate through RT-qPCR and viral and Wolbachia quantification were performed in comparison with serial dilution of a standard curve of the respective genes cloned into the pGEMT plasmid (Promega) 16,27. Therefore, it was possible to calculate the number of copies per tissue. As a mosquito control gene we used the RPS 17S sequence of Ae. aegypti (Moreira 2009) 15.
